biotools.summary: This is a tool for the identification of viruses and their integration sites in host genomes using any type of NGS data. Its unique features include the characterization of insertion loci of any type of virus in the host genome and high accuracy and computational efficiency because of its well-designed pipeline.

bioschemas.name: VirusHunter
